long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tiny extension that reminds you just how much money billionaires have. Pulls from Bloomberg's list of 500 richest people, and adds their worth next to their name whenever it appears on a webpage. Worth can be shown in dollars, or for more context: years of minimum wage work, school budgets, or meals.
